alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Boyd; Chase; Lincoln; Logan; Perkins; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 12 at 3:46AM CST until December 15 at 6:00AM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow and mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 6 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Boyd, Rock, Blaine, Logan, Perkins, Lincoln, and Chase Counties. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on very slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A sharp gradient in snow totals is expected as higher snowfall totals occur to the west and much more rain and mixed precipitation will occur to the east.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Blaine; Boyd; Chase; Lincoln; Logan; Perkins; Rock
